mapper.select: SELECT SCODE_KEY ,SCODE_VALUE FROM standardcode WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE'
SELECT MNG_NAME ,MNG_ID FROM MANAGER ORDER BY MNG_NAME ASC
SELECT A.STUDENT_NAME ,A.STUDENT_ID FROM STUDENT A, PARENT B WHERE A.PARENT_ID = B.PARENT_ID AND A.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} ORDER BY A.STUDENT_GRADE DESC
SELECT CNSLT_ID, CNSLT_SCH_DATE, CNSLT_SCH_TIME, CNSLT_TYPE, MNG_ID FROM CONSULTING WHERE CNSLT_APPLYER = #{parentId} OR CNSLT_APPLYER = #{studentId}

SELECT CNSLT_SCH_TIME AS DISABLETIME ,'CONSULT' AS CATEGORY FROM CONSULTING WHERE CNSLT_SCH_DATE LIKE #{date}||'%'
UNION SELECT TIMETABLE_START_TIME AS DISABLETIME ,'LESSON' AS CATEGORY FROM TIMETABLE WHERE TIMETABLE_ID IN ( SELECT TIMETABLE_ID AS TIMETABLEID FROM LESSONTIME WHERE LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID IN (SELECT LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID FROM LESSONASSIGNMENT WHERE MNG_ID = #{managerId} AND LA_STATE_CODE IN('WAIT','NOSYL','GOING'))) AND TIMETABLE_DAY_OF_WEEK = #{day}
SELECT CNSLT_ID, CNSLT_SCH_DATE, CNSLT_SCH_TIME, CNSLT_CONFIRM_YN, CNSLT_APPLY_CONTENT, CNSLT_APPLYER, CNSLT_TARGET, CNSLT_TYPE FROM CONSULTING WHERE MNG_ID = #{mngId}
SELECT CNSLT_APPLYER, CNSLT_TARGET FROM CONSULTING WHERE CNSLT_ID = #{cnsltId}

SELECT A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_CONFIRM_YN, A.CNSLT_APPLY_CONTENT, A.CNSLT_APPLYER, A.CNSLT_TARGET, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, C.STUDENT_NAME, C.STUDENT_HP, D.PARENT_NAME, D.PARENT_HP, E.SCHOOL_NAME, F.SCODE_VALUE || C.STUDENT_GRADE AS GRADE, H.CLASS_NAME FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B, STUDENT C, PARENT D, SCHOOL E, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE' ) F, BELONG G, CLASS H WHERE CNSLT_ID = #{cnsltId} AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET=C.STUDENT_ID AND A.CNSLT_APPLYER=D.PARENT_ID AND C.SCHOOL_NO=E.SCHOOL_ID AND C.STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE = F.SCODE_KEY AND C.STUDENT_ID = G.STUDENT_ID AND G.CLASS_ID = H.CLASS_ID

SELECT A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_CONFIRM_YN, A.CNSLT_APPLY_CONTENT, A.CNSLT_APPLYER, A.CNSLT_TARGET, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, C.STUDENT_NAME, C.STUDENT_HP, E.SCHOOL_NAME, F.SCODE_VALUE || C.STUDENT_GRADE AS GRADE, H.CLASS_NAME FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B, STUDENT C, SCHOOL E, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE' ) F, BELONG G, CLASS H WHERE CNSLT_ID = #{cnsltId} AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET=C.STUDENT_ID AND C.SCHOOL_NO=E.SCHOOL_ID AND C.STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE = F.SCODE_KEY AND C.STUDENT_ID = G.STUDENT_ID AND G.CLASS_ID = H.CLASS_ID AND A.CNSLT_APPLYER = A.CNSLT_TARGET

SELECT D.PARENT_ID AS APPLYER_ID, A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, D.PARENT_NAME AS CNSLT_APPLYER, A.MNG_ID, E.MNG_NAME FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B, PARENT D, MANAGER E WHERE D.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} AND CNSLT_TARGET IN (SELECT STUDENT_ID FROM STUDENT WHERE PARENT_ID =#{parentId} ) AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_APPLYER=D.PARENT_ID AND A.MNG_ID = E.MNG_ID AND A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE > SYSDATE
union
SELECT C.STUDENT_ID AS APPLYER_ID, A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, C.STUDENT_NAME AS CNSLT_APPLYER, A.MNG_ID, E.MNG_NAME FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B, STUDENT C, PARENT D, MANAGER E WHERE D.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} AND CNSLT_TARGET IN (SELECT STUDENT_ID FROM STUDENT WHERE PARENT_ID =#{parentId} ) AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_APPLYER=C.STUDENT_ID AND C.PARENT_ID= D.PARENT_ID AND A.MNG_ID = E.MNG_ID AND A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY CNSLT_SCH_DATE ASC

SELECT A.CNSLT_APPLYER, C.STUDENT_NAME, A.CNSLT_ID, D.PARENT_NAME, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, A.MNG_ID, E.MNG_NAME FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B,STUDENT C, PARENT D, MANAGER E WHERE CNSLT_TARGET = #{studentId} AND CNSLT_APPLYER = #{studentId} AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET= C.STUDENT_ID AND C.PARENT_ID= D.PARENT_ID AND A.MNG_ID = E.MNG_ID AND A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY CNSLT_SCH_DATE ASC

SELECT A.CNSLT_TARGET, C.STUDENT_NAME, A.CNSLT_ID, D.PARENT_NAME, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, A.MNG_ID, E.MNG_NAME, A.CNSLT_APPLY_CONTENT, A.CNSLT_CONFIRM_YN FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B,STUDENT C, PARENT D, MANAGER E WHERE A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET= C.STUDENT_ID AND C.PARENT_ID= D.PARENT_ID AND A.MNG_ID = E.MNG_ID AND A.CNSLT_ID = #{cnsltId}

SELECT C.STUDENT_ID AS TARKET_ID, D.PARENT_ID AS APPLYER_ID, A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, C.STUDENT_NAME AS CNSLT_TARGET, D.PARENT_NAME AS CNSLT_APPLYER, A.CNSLT_COMPLETION_YN, A.CNSLT_AS FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B, STUDENT C, PARENT D WHERE A.MNG_ID = #{mngId} AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET=C.STUDENT_ID AND A.CNSLT_APPLYER=D.PARENT_ID AND SYSDATE > A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE AND A.CNSLT_CONFIRM_YN ='Y'

SELECT C.STUDENT_ID AS TARKET_ID, C.STUDENT_ID AS APPLYER_ID, A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, C.STUDENT_NAME AS CNSLT_TARGET, C.STUDENT_NAME AS CNSLT_APPLYER, A.CNSLT_COMPLETION_YN, A.CNSLT_AS FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B, STUDENT C WHERE A.MNG_ID = #{mngId} AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET=C.STUDENT_ID AND A.CNSLT_APPLYER = A.CNSLT_TARGET AND SYSDATE > A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE AND A.CNSLT_CONFIRM_YN ='Y' ORDER BY CNSLT_SCH_DATE DESC

SELECT A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_COMPLETION_YN, A.CNSLT_APPLY_CONTENT, A.CNSLT_AS, A.CNSLT_APPLYER, A.CNSLT_TARGET, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, C.STUDENT_NAME, C.STUDENT_HP, D.PARENT_NAME, D.PARENT_HP, E.SCHOOL_NAME, F.SCODE_VALUE || C.STUDENT_GRADE AS GRADE, H.CLASS_NAME FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B, STUDENT C, PARENT D, SCHOOL E, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE' ) F, BELONG G, CLASS H WHERE CNSLT_ID = #{cnsltId} AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET=C.STUDENT_ID AND A.CNSLT_APPLYER=D.PARENT_ID AND C.SCHOOL_NO=E.SCHOOL_ID AND C.STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE = F.SCODE_KEY AND C.STUDENT_ID = G.STUDENT_ID AND G.CLASS_ID = H.CLASS_ID

SELECT A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_COMPLETION_YN, A.CNSLT_APPLY_CONTENT, A.CNSLT_CONTENT, A.CNSLT_AS, A.CNSLT_APPLYER, A.CNSLT_TARGET, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, C.STUDENT_NAME, C.STUDENT_HP, E.SCHOOL_NAME, F.SCODE_VALUE || C.STUDENT_GRADE AS GRADE, H.CLASS_NAME FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B, STUDENT C, SCHOOL E, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE' ) F, BELONG G, CLASS H WHERE CNSLT_ID = #{cnsltId} AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET=C.STUDENT_ID AND C.SCHOOL_NO=E.SCHOOL_ID AND C.STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE = F.SCODE_KEY AND C.STUDENT_ID = G.STUDENT_ID AND G.CLASS_ID = H.CLASS_ID AND A.CNSLT_APPLYER = A.CNSLT_TARGET
mapper.update: UPDATE CONSULTING SET CNSLT_CONTENT = #{cnsltContent}, CNSLT_AS = #{cnsltAs}, CNSLT_COMPLETION_YN = 'Y' WHERE CNSLT_ID = #{cnsltId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.CNSLT_TARGET, C.STUDENT_NAME, A.CNSLT_ID, D.PARENT_NAME, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, A.MNG_ID, E.MNG_NAME, A.CNSLT_COMPLETION_YN FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B,STUDENT C, PARENT D, MANAGER E WHERE CNSLT_TARGET IN (SELECT STUDENT_ID FROM STUDENT WHERE PARENT_ID = #{parentId} ) AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET= C.STUDENT_ID AND C.PARENT_ID= D.PARENT_ID AND A.MNG_ID = E.MNG_ID AND SYSDATE > A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE ORDER BY CNSLT_SCH_DATE ASC

SELECT A.CNSLT_TARGET, C.STUDENT_NAME, A.CNSLT_ID, A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE, A.CNSLT_SCH_TIME, A.CNSLT_TYPE, B.SCODE_VALUE, A.MNG_ID, E.MNG_NAME, A.CNSLT_COMPLETION_YN FROM CONSULTING A, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'CNSLT_TYPE' ) B,STUDENT C, PARENT D, MANAGER E WHERE CNSLT_TARGET = #{studentId} AND CNSLT_APPLYER = #{studentId} AND A.CNSLT_TYPE = B.SCODE_KEY AND A.CNSLT_TARGET= C.STUDENT_ID AND C.PARENT_ID= D.PARENT_ID AND A.MNG_ID = E.MNG_ID AND SYSDATE > A.CNSLT_SCH_DATE ORDER BY CNSLT_SCH_DATE DESC
